biolockj.module

Interface ScriptModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BioModule
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClassifierModule, JavaModule, ParserModule, SeqModule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AwkFastaConverter, BuildQiimeMapping, ClassifierModuleImpl, Demultiplexer, Gunzipper, Humann2Classifier, Humann2Parser, JavaModuleImpl, JsonReport, KneadData, Kraken2Classifier, Kraken2Parser, KrakenClassifier, KrakenParser, MergeQiimeOtuTables, Metaphlan2Classifier, Metaphlan2Parser, Multiplexer, ParserModuleImpl, PearMergeReads, QiimeClassifier, QiimeClosedRefClassifier, QiimeDeNovoClassifier, QiimeOpenRefClassifier, QiimeParser, RarefySeqs, RdpClassifier, RdpParser, RegisterNumReads, ScriptModuleImpl, SeqFileValidator, SeqModuleImpl, SlimmClassifier, SlimmParser, TrimPrimers

    public interface ScriptModule
extends BioModule
    Classes that implement this interface are

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SCRIPT_BATCH_SIZE
      Config Integer property: "script.batchSize"
      Set number of samples to process per script (if parallel processing)
      static String SCRIPT_DEFAULT_HEADER
      Config List property: "script.defaultHeader"
      Store default script header for MAIN script and locally run WORKER scripts.
      static String SCRIPT_NUM_THREADS
      Config Integer property: "script.numThreads"
      Used to reserve cluster resources and passed to any external application call that accepts a numThreads parameter.
      static String SCRIPT_PERMISSIONS
      Config String property: "script.permissions"
      Used as chmod permission parameter (ex: 774)
      static String SCRIPT_TIMEOUT
      Config Integer property: "script.timeout"
      Sets # of minutes before worker scripts times out.

      • Fields inherited from interface biolockj.module.BioModule

        MAIN_SCRIPT_PREFIX, OUTPUT_DIR, TEMP_DIR

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<List<String>> buildScript(List<File> files)
      Method returns a nested list of bash script lines to classify samples containing forward reads only.
      List<List<String>> buildScriptForPairedReads(List<File> files)
      Method returns a nested list of bash script lines to classify samples containing paired reads.
      The inner list contains the bash script lines required to classify 1 sample.
      String[] getJobParams()
      Many ScriptModules generate bash or R scripts for the Operating System to run as a Job.
      The Job creates a Process using the parameters supplied by this method and executed in the Runtime environment.
      Parameters typically contain the full script path and script parameters, if needed.
      File getMainScript()
      Method returns MAIN module script that calls each of the worker scripts.
      File getScriptDir()
      ScriptModules that generate scripts to complete their task, create script files in this directory.
      The main script must begin with prefix and there must only be one main script.
      The main script executes, or submits to the job queue, each of the other scripts in this directory.
      The # subscripts generated by the ScriptModule depends upon "script.batchSize".
      List<String> getScriptErrors()
      Return a list of the error messages saved the failure scripts in the module script directory.
      Integer getTimeout()
      ScriptModule that run scripts can opt to set a timeout (such as used by the R script).
      List<String> getWorkerScriptFunctions()
      Method returns bash script lines used to build the functions called by the worker scripts.

      • Methods inherited from interface biolockj.module.BioModule

        checkDependencies, cleanUp, executeTask, getID, getInputFiles, getModuleDir, getOutputDir, getPostRequisiteModules, getPreRequisiteModules, getSummary, getTempDir, init, isValidInputModule

    • Method Detail

      • buildScript

        List<List<String>> buildScript(List<File> files)
                        throws Exception
        Method returns a nested list of bash script lines to classify samples containing forward reads only. The inner list contains the bash script lines required to classify 1 sample.
        Parameters:
        files - Files in the input directory that contain only forward reads
        Returns:
        Nested list of bash scripts lines
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to generate script lines

      • buildScriptForPairedReads

        List<List<String>> buildScriptForPairedReads(List<File> files)
                                      throws Exception
        Method returns a nested list of bash script lines to classify samples containing paired reads.
        The inner list contains the bash script lines required to classify 1 sample.
        Parameters:
        files - Files in the input directory that contain only paired reads
        Returns:
        Nested list of bash scripts lines
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to generate the script lines

      • getJobParams

        String[] getJobParams()
               throws Exception
        Many ScriptModules generate bash or R scripts for the Operating System to run as a Job.
        The Job creates a Process using the parameters supplied by this method and executed in the Runtime environment.
        Parameters typically contain the full script path and script parameters, if needed.
        Returns:
        Runtime.exec(String) parameters
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to build the job parameters

      • getMainScript

        File getMainScript()
            throws Exception
        Method returns MAIN module script that calls each of the worker scripts.
        Returns:
        Bash script lines for the functions
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getScriptDir

        File getScriptDir()
        ScriptModules that generate scripts to complete their task, create script files in this directory.
        The main script must begin with prefix and there must only be one main script.
        The main script executes, or submits to the job queue, each of the other scripts in this directory.
        The # subscripts generated by the ScriptModule depends upon "script.batchSize".
        Returns:
        File directory containing all ScriptModule scripts

      • getScriptErrors

        List<String> getScriptErrors()
                      throws Exception
        Return a list of the error messages saved the failure scripts in the module script directory.
        Returns:
        List of error messages or empty list
        Throws:
        Exception - if runtime errors occur

      • getTimeout

        Integer getTimeout()
            throws ConfigFormatException
        ScriptModule that run scripts can opt to set a timeout (such as used by the R script).
        Returns:
        Number of minutes before script is cancelled due to timeout
        Throws:
        ConfigFormatException - if the "script.timeout" value is invalid

      • getWorkerScriptFunctions

        List<String> getWorkerScriptFunctions()
                               throws Exception
        Method returns bash script lines used to build the functions called by the worker scripts.
        Returns:
        Bash script lines for the functions
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur
